mdRecord.dcterms:title: One hundred & fifty miles around Richmond
Battle ground of the Wilderness and Spottsylvania Court House, May 5-23, 1864
One hundred and fifty miles around Richmond
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Magnus, Charles. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : printed col. ; 53 cm. in diam., on sheet 74 x 88 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Eleventh Edition 3000 of Magnus' all around Map. [original]
At head of title: Battle ground of the Wilderness and Spottsylvania Court House. May 5-23, 1864. [original]
The central circular map shows the country around Richmond, and is surrounded by nine smaller circular maps of other battle areas. Map in blue with red border and title. [original]

Ancillary maps: 225 miles around Vicksburg, Miss. -- Memphis and Nashville, Tenn. -- Knoxville, Tenn., Danville, Ky. and Parkersburg, Va. -- 100 miles around Chattanooga, Tenn. -- 250 miles around Galveston, Texas -- 250 miles around Charleston, S.C. -- Fortifications around Richmond, Va. -- 200 miles around Montgomery, Ala. -- 100 miles around Milledgeville, Ga. [original]
"Dedicated to the gallant soldiers, fighting to suppress the rebellion." -- In red, at lower right. [original]
"Deutsche und englishe Buchdruckerei, lithographische Anstalt und Verlagshandlung" follows the imprint. [original]
Stephenson and McKee, Virginia in Maps, Map IV-27 (A-B), reproduces an image of the 10th edition. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Mounted on linen. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond (Va.)--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Maps
Virginia--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Maps
